logoRight.name: Distance to the right border
logoRight.description[zh_CN]: 图标的右边界与桌面窗口右边界的水平距离。
logoRight.description: The horizontal distance between the right boundary of the icon and the right boundary of the desktop window.

logoBottom.name: Distance to the bottom border
logoBottom.description[zh_CN]: 图标的下边界与桌面窗口下边界的垂直距离。
logoBottom.description: The vertical distance between the lower boundary of the icon and the lower boundary of the desktop window.

logoWidth.name: Width of logo
logoWidth.description: The width of the logo area to display.

logoHeight.name: Height of logo
logoHeight.description: The height of the logo area to display.

textXPos.name: Horizontal position of the text
textXPos.description[zh_CN]: 文本区域的左边界到图标区域左边界的水平距离。
textXPos.description: Horizontal distance from the left border of the text area to the left border of the logo area.

textYPos.name: Vertical position of the text
textYPos.description[zh_CN]: 文本区域的上边界到图标区域上边界的垂直距离。
textYPos.description: Vertical distance from the upper boundary of the text area to the upper boundary of the logo area.

textWidth.name: Width of text area
textWidth.description: The width of the text area to display.

textHeight.name: Height of text area
textHeight.description: Height of the text display area.

textColor.name: Color of text
textColor.description[zh_CN]: 文本的颜色，格式为十六进制的颜色值ARGB，#F5F5F5F5。
textColor.description: The color of the text, formatted as a hexadecimal color value, #F5F5F5F5.

textFontSize.name: Font size of text
textFontSize.description[zh_CN]: 文本的字体大小，值为像素大小。
textFontSize.description: The font size of the text, the value is in pixels.

textAlign.name: Text Alignment
textAlign.description[zh_CN]: 文本的对齐方式，左对齐：0x0001，右对齐：0x0002，水平居中：0x0004，上对齐：0x0020，下对齐：0x0040，垂直居中：0x0080。可组合，如左下对齐：0x0001|0x0040=0x0041=65
textAlign.description: Text alignment, left justified: 0x0001, right justified: 0x0002, horizontally centered: 0x0004, top justified: 0x0020, bottom justified: 0x0040, vertically centered: 0x0080.Can be combined, e.g. bottom left alignment: 0x0001|0x0040=0x0041=65
